title: AI Limit
description:
In the aftermath of a catastrophic collapse of humanity’s artificial ecosystem, the world was plunged into chaos. Natural disasters and brutal wars erased civilization, leaving behind a desolate landscape. Centuries later, a strange, pervasive substance called the Mud spread across the land, giving rise to monstrous creatures. You will journey into Havenswell, the last bastion of humankind, exploring its decaying remnants – from the damp sewers to the sprawling slums and the once-proud sky city above the lake. Your quest is to uncover the truth behind this devastation, facing deadly enemies and unraveling a haunting history.
You play as a Blader, a being of human appearance but born from mysterious technology. Driven by their own enigmatic missions, Bladers embark on solitary and perilous journeys, possessing the power to respawn after death through the use of Branches. Now, with the Branches destroyed, you must search for and repair them throughout the city. Along your path, you’ll encounter fellow Bladers and struggling humans, sharing their joys, sorrows, and unwavering faith in the face of despair. Together, you will seek the truth behind the plagues and disasters that have ravaged the world. MYRIAD DEATH
Prepare to face a terrifying array of foes: warriors driven mad by despair, transformed into savage beasts; blade-covered killing machines that stalk the skies; and colossal creatures that devastate cities with their destructive power. You will need to challenge these powerful entities, mastering the art of death and rebirth as you learn to anticipate their ferocious attacks. Each encounter will test your skill and determination, pushing you to your limits as you strive to survive and continue your journey to the world’s end. The fate of Havenswell, and perhaps what remains of humanity, rests on your shoulders. Navigate the treacherous ruins, forge alliances, and uncover the secrets that lie hidden within the shadows. The path ahead is fraught with danger, but the hope of a restored world drives you onward.

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
